list.expr: group by (container, alertname) (ALERTS{namespace="vsppm-$environment", container=~".+", tier="", alertstate="firing"})
list.name: Alerts

panels.description: The number of collected prices of competitors that were published by the anti-corruption layer

targets.expr: round(sum((increase(price_monitoring_legacy_competitor_prices_transitions_total{namespace="vsppm-${environment}",location_id =~ "$location", status="gathered"}[$period])))) or vector(0)

panels.title: Competitor Prices - Gathered [$period]

panels.description: Number of benchmarks that Scheduler transferred to IN_PROGRESS status
panels.title: Benchmarks - Started [$period]

panels.description: Number of benchmarks that Scheduler transferred to FINISHED status
panels.title: Benchmarks - Competed [$period]

panels.description: Number of benchmarks that differ from the target value
panels.title: Benchmarks - Wrong [$period]

panels.description: Number of benchmarks that Scheduler transferred to FAILED status.
panels.title: Benchmarks - Failed [$period]

panels.description: The maximum number of benchmarks per second that the Benchmark Service saved during the selected aggregation period
panels.title: Benchmarks - Max Rate [$period]

panels.description: Number of benchmarks that Benchmark Service saved
panels.title: Benchmarks - Stored [$period]

panels.description: Number of benchmarks that Benchmark Service saved
panels.title: Benchmarks - Reported [$period]

panels.description: Table showing statistics on processed sales prices by location
panels.title: Sales Prices - Totals By Location  [$period]

panels.description: Shows WARN and ERROR level logs that occurred in the anti-corruption-layer container

targets.expr: {namespace="vsppm-${environment}", container="anti-corruption-layer", location_id =~ "$location"} | json | level=~"ERROR|WARN"| line_format "| {{.message | replace \"\\n\" \" \" }}"

panels.title: Application Logs

panels.description: A bar chart over time showing the number of competitor prices published by ACL
panels.title: Competitor Prices - Published [$period]

panels.description: Table showing statistics on processed sales prices by location
panels.title: Competitor Prices - Totals By Location [$period]

targets.expr: round(sum(increase(price_monitoring_benchmarks_transitions_total{namespace="vsppm-$environment", location_id =~ "$location", status="pending"}[$period])))
round(sum(increase(price_monitoring_benchmarks_transitions_total{namespace="vsppm-$environment", location_id =~ "$location", status="finished"}[$period])))
round(sum(increase(price_monitoring_benchmarks_transitions_total{namespace="vsppm-$environment", location_id =~ "$location", status="wrong"}[$period])))
round(sum(increase(price_monitoring_benchmarks_transitions_total{namespace="vsppm-$environment",location_id =~ "$location", status="failed"}[$period])))

panels.description: Shows WARN and ERROR level logs that occurred in the anti-corruption-layer container

targets.expr: {namespace="vsppm-${environment}", container=~"benchmark-.*", location_id =~ "$location"} | json | level=~"ERROR|WARN" | line_format "| {{.message | replace \"\\n\" \" \" }}"

panels.title: Application Logs
